CustomField.description: Specifies value for the parameter. It can be - a constant value if the parameter type is Constant, Date/Datetime - field name if parameter type is Context Value - class name if parameter type is Function
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies value for the parameter. It can be - a constant value if the parameter type is Constant, Date/Datetime - field name if parameter type is Context Value - class name if parameter type is Function
CustomField.label: Value
